wybug_title: admastern内部设计不当导致导致信息泄露
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-02-29：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-03-05：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： http://www.wooyun.org/bugs/wooyun-2015-0133968   你们公司的，我又来来。。 详细说明：   WooYun: SocialMaster某员工邮箱密码=导致各种微博交易数据泄漏    你们公司的，我又来来。。https://github.com/wmrococo/idsync/blob/2da7845ca98b1a32acaab2cc008e729f6628f137/src/main/java/cn/com/admaster/utils/MailHelper.javapublic static void main(String[] args) {        Date d = new Date();//当前时间        String date = d.toLocaleString().toString();        String insertCount = "12322435456565767";        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();        sb.append("ids pc insert data success!").append("\t").append(date).append("\t").append("insert data count:").append(insertCount);        send("smtp.exmail.qq.com","wangmeng@admaster.com.cn","wangmeng@admaster.com.cn","SUCCESS",sb.toString(),"wangmeng@admaster.com.cn","Wm452928");//        send("smtp.exmail.qq.com","wangmeng@admaster.com.cn","wangmeng@admaster.com.cn,pengyuanbo@admaster.com.cn,zhaojinling@admaster.com.cn,zhouxiaoxiang@admaster.com.cn","SUCCESS","IDS mobile INSERT DATA SUCCESS!","wangmeng@admaster.com.cn","Wm452928");//        send("smtp.exmail.qq.com","wangmeng@admaster.com.cn","wangmeng@admaster.com.cn,pengyuanbo@admaster.com.cn,zhaojinling@admaster.com.cn,zhouxiaoxiang@admaster.com.cn","Failure","IDS pc INSERT DATA Failure!","wangmeng@admaster.com.cn","Wm452928");//        send("smtp.exmail.qq.com","wangmeng@admaster.com.cn","wangmeng@admaster.com.cn,pengyuanbo@admaster.com.cn,zhaojinling@admaster.com.cn,zhouxiaoxiang@admaster.com.cn","Failure","IDS mobile INSERT DATA Failure!","wangmeng@admaster.com.cn","Wm452928");    }你以为又是泄露？哈哈，并不是。。。
